properties.name: flyway.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Flyway migrations.

properties.name: spring.flyway.mongodb.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable MongoDB migrations in Flyway.

properties.name: spring.flyway.mongodb.locations
properties.description: Locations of MongoDB migration scripts for Flyway.

properties.name: spring.flyway.oracle.baseline-on-migrate
properties.description: Whether to baseline the Oracle database on migration.

properties.name: spring.flyway.oracle.locations
properties.description: Locations of Oracle migration scripts for Flyway.

properties.name: spring.flyway.oracle.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Oracle migrations in Flyway.

properties.name: influxdb.username
properties.description: Username for connecting to InfluxDB.

properties.name: influxdb.password
properties.description: Password for connecting to InfluxDB.

properties.name: influxdb.url
properties.description: URL for connecting to InfluxDB.

properties.name: influxdb.database
properties.description: Database name for connecting to InfluxDB.

properties.name: spring.data.neo4j.migrations.location
properties.description: Location of migration scripts for Neo4j database.

properties.name: flyway.locations
properties.description: Location of migration scripts for Flyway.

properties.name: flyway.cassandra.user
properties.description: Username for connecting to Cassandra database using Flyway.

properties.name: flyway.cassandra.password
properties.description: Password for connecting to Cassandra database using Flyway.

properties.name: flyway.cassandra.url
properties.description: JDBC URL for connecting to Cassandra database using Flyway.

properties.name: pinecone.environment
properties.description: Environment for Pinecone (e.g., 'us-west1-gcp').

properties.name: pinecone.apiKey
properties.description: API key for accessing Pinecone service.

properties.name: cloud.aws.region.static
properties.description: AWS region for static configuration.

properties.name: cloud.aws.credentials.access-key
properties.description: AWS access key for authentication.

properties.name: cloud.aws.credentials.secret-key
properties.description: AWS secret key for authentication.

description: This object contains configuration properties for Flyway, InfluxDB, and Neo4j migrations, including support for Cassandra, Pinecone, and AWS.
